name: I summon thee, Dice God
description:
Controls Overworld

A / Left Arrow Key - Move left
D / Right Arrow Key - Move right
W / Up Arrow Key - Move up
S / Down Arrow Key - Move down
ESC - Pause game

This game was developed in less than 50hrs for GMTK 2022 game jam.

Combat

In combat you only need to select your choice between these:

  • Attack: Execute an attack depending in your weapon and luck (skills)
  • Pray: Pray to Dice God for blessing in battle
  • Items: Heal yourself with a potion or... use coins?

This game was developed in less than 50hrs for GMTK 2022 game jam.

Credits
  • Daniel Retamal
  • Francisco Ramírez
  • Nicolás Santibáñez
  • Raimundo Villarroel
